description:
One of the great advantages to learning a foreign language is that you start understanding and appreciating your own native language more. In Dr. Bogard's "Master" series, you will master the ten grammar areas of the German language by seeing how that structure works in the English language.

Now each topic makes more sense to you and you accelerate your progress in becoming fluent in German faster. Your lessons here are short and sweet and specific to one important grammar topic that is critical to mastering your German writing and speaking skills.

The course you see here is a grammar course specific to German adjectives. When you are finished with these lessons, you will know everything you need to speak and write correctly using this German grammar feature. Click the "Take this Course" button to start making German easier now.

Here is the outline of the TTLG Master Series:

  • Part A: Articles
  • Part B: Nouns
  • Part C: Adjectives (this course)
  • Part D: Pronouns
  • Part E: Verbs
  • Part F: Adverbs
  • Part G: Prepositions
  • Part H: Conjunctions
  • Part I: Mechanics
title: Time to Learn German Grammar- Master the Adjectives
